title: Amazon Fire OS 8 adds updates from Android 10 and Android 11
content:
Amazon recently announced its latest tablets, the Amazon Fire 7 and Amazon Fire 7 Kids. The Fire 7 tablet is the best bang for the buck in Amazon’s tablet line, with the latest editions offering an updated SoC, more RAM, better battery life, and Fire OS 8. According to Amazon, Fire OS 8 will incorporate

The post Amazon Fire OS 8 adds updates from Android 10 and Android 11 appeared first on XDA.
description: Amazon's latest Fire 7 tablets will make us of updates found in Android 10 and Android 11. The tablet arrives on June 29.
